WorkItem.Description:
Hi.
 
Thank you for Simple OOXML.
 
I would like the ability to convert an existing excel (.xls) file to open xml format.
 
Is this on the roadmap?
 
I found this project that is able to read and write to excel (.xls) files without Excel that I am hoping efforts can be combined to integrate the two solutions.
 
ExcelLibrary
http://code.google.com/p/excellibrary/
(formerly ExcelReader)
 
I have already made a post on http://code.google.com/p/excellibrary/wiki/ImplementingOpenXmlSupport to make them aware of this project.
 
Thank you.

Comments.Message: No, this is not part of the roadmap. Sorry.
